Techniques

Muon Simulation Optimization Tricks¶

Questions¶

  1. what needs to be done to implement these tricks in the simulation ?
  2. how much processing time it will save ?
  3. and run some testing and validation to make sure we are not producing a biased sample.

INWG plan¶

We are also planning to ask the production group to produce a separate sample of 100,000 muon events with full optical photon propagation to be used for muon tracking validation.

Pre-scaling of optical photons¶

  • http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/cgi-bin/DocDB/ShowDocument?docid=6923
  • opweight_20110911_v0.pdf

Increasing cross sections¶

  • http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/cgi-bin/DocDB/ShowDocument?docid=6726
